title: Poro Frenzy !

embed.description: Wuju Creative. 9 likes Â· 4 talking about this. Welcome to Wuju Creative Facebook Page ! Here you can see all information regarding the progress of our...

body:
The long wait has finally come to an end !

Poro Frenzy {{summoner:31}} is now Live at App Store & Play Store !
It's a game featuring Poro, a cute little creature that we always see in howling abyss !
To find the game simply type "Poro" at Play Store & Press More if necessary.
For Appstore, simply type Poro Frenzy !
If you enjoy the game, please be sure to give this fluffy creature 5 star cookies  and a review.

It's time to feed these fluffy creatures {{item:2010}} 
Best of Luck Summoners ! {{summoner:30}}

replies.body: ooooh cute and also {{champion:432}} is nutritious 4 all poro cos he is fat
Hahaha yup they are cuteee indeed :3 {{summoner:31}} , i hope you guys liked it ! Please spread the news guys !
